title: I want to deactivate my account for a week due to finals
body: Hi riot support, I have finals next week and a lot of work to do before the semester ends. To do this I will have to stop playing league of legends till then, but i am an addict. I cannot resist not playing it when it lies there on my desktop. I do not want to uninstall the game because reinstalling takes a long time and i am going to come back in a week's time anyway. So to my point, is there a way to deactivate my account till the 16th of December? Do i have to message riot support with some specifics. Thanks for spending your time reading this.

replies.body:
I admire the honesty in your post and that you're taking proactive measures in order to nail those finals! You'll have to reach out in a [**support ticket**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) so one of our account specialists can assist you with temporarily *deactivating* your account. Just be sure to specify that you want to deactivate it rather than *delete* it.

Let me know if you have any questions~
